whatAreCookies.title: 1. What are Cookies
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device (computer, tablet, smartphone) when you visit a website. Cookies allow the site to remember your actions and preferences (such as login, language, font size, and other display settings) for a certain period of time, so you don't have to re-enter them every time you return to the site or browse from one page to another.

howWeUse.title: 2. How We Use Cookies

essential.title: Essential Cookies
